channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report E-2024050323
item.description:
Report E-2024050323

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-21T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-15
  • City: DURANGO
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG MERCHANT GAS GROUP, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 217500
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: The KAG Merchant Gas Group, LLC unit was traveling eastbound on Highway 160 near Durango, Colorado when it drifted off the roadway and rolled over. The trailer was compromised as a result of the rollover and approximately 35,740 pounds of refrigerated natural gas was released into the atmosphere. The local hazmat agency handled the remediation.
